website_summaries.verdict: High-quality tactical vest is an affordable option.
pros: Single size offering fits most due to girth and length adjustments
Comes with a pistol holder that holds most guns and 3 magazine holder pockets
cons: Customers found that the vest is uncomfortable and they struggled to find the right fit

customer_reviews.title: First of all I really like the vet
customer_reviews.text: First of all I really like the vet, and like all the pouch features. I was reluctant to buy this because I was afraid it wouldn't fit, but after making adjustments, it was great. I am 6'3 250 lbs and the vest fits good. My s&w semi big frame fits the holster good. The ammo pouches are great and over all I think it is a good quality vest.
customer_reviews.author: Chrisf

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Took me a minute to adjust everything, being 5' 5 1/2" & 160 it was super large.. Fits perfect after learning all the adjustments..
customer_reviews.author: RJGould

customer_reviews.title: I got this for my son and he is overjoyed with it
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my son and he is overjoyed with it. It adjusts at the shoulders, the sides and the waist. He carries everything he needs for airsoft battles. His pistol, extra clips, extra ammo, extra air-cartridges, flashlight, two knives, compass, maps, walkie, phone, gps, and a few other items. He loves this so much he even uses it when shooting with real guns and amo as well as hunting with orange under shirt and orange over vest.
customer_reviews.author: jon smith

customer_reviews.title: Tactical vest
customer_reviews.text: Received this item rapidly. It is a top notch professional vest with many pockets of various sizes for storage of most anything. It is well constructed and adjustable to fit you individually. The belt is adjustable and the buckle is really secure. The built in holster accommodates a 9MM just fine. There is plenty of room to store ammo also. The Velcro strap closures are very tight and secure. I would highly recommend this vest.
customer_reviews.author: Claude M. Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.text: Good sturdy construction. Holds 5 AR clips, 6 pistol clips, 6 shotgun rounds and a multi tool. And one handgun. And a pocket for the ever important cell phone. Belt is good quality and very adjustable.
customer_reviews.author: DadaTacThony

customer_reviews.title: A little big for 5’3” 90 lbs. Need horizontal holster mount option.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my kids. They’re 5’2” - 5’3” and about 90 lbs. Torso length had to be adjusted so only 1/4 of the Velcro strap was making contact. The belt at minimum is still a little loose. They will grow into it, but I hope the shoulder strap do dot come off while they’re running around. The holster has both Velcro and straps, but the straps are attached in a way that requires the holster to be vertical. Would be nice to have the option of horizontal mount.
customer_reviews.author: pda

customer_reviews.title: Cannot recommend
customer_reviews.text: Product is kind of cheap; I would recommend getting a higher priced vest for airsoft. Buckle shattered after less than 4 months and pistol holster does not hold gun properly (button snapped open while running). I lost my airsoft pistol out on the field and someone was nice enough to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Llocsird'o Ttam

customer_reviews.title: OUTSTANDING VALUE ON A FIRST-RATE TACTICAL VEST!
customer_reviews.text: This is a multifunctional vest for a great price. It has plenty of storage for magazines and even loose ammo. Amazingly adjustable from small-frame men ( and women of course) to massive wide bodies like myself. Extra pockets, sturdy adjustable belt, and built in handgun holster ( best for small to medium frame semi-autos or revolvers). Lightweight and looks marvelous!
customer_reviews.author: John McKenzie

customer_reviews.title: So small it’s ridiculous
customer_reviews.text: 4xl!???? Huh? Yeah, in China maybe. This is so small it doesn’t come remotely close to fitting. It fits my 12 year old son but I don’t think it will next year. If you are bigger than a small boy, don’t buy it.
customer_reviews.author: No one in particular

customer_reviews.title: Runs small as most do
customer_reviews.text: I gave up looking for one to fit USA size body. It will fit a thinner high school size body, but all were that way. When it comes from overseas then you will not find one to fit larger size. I wear a 48” pants and 54 jacket and this was not even close to fitting me. But all brands I tried were this way. I added strap length of 8” to the 6 straps on side 4” on shoulder and 16” on belt. It then would fit ok and it is functional and even with the alterations still great price.
customer_reviews.author: John White Buffalo

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: This was great for my SWAT halloween costume, but I think it'd work just fine for real-life adventures. Front easily held my S&W MPS2 and the adjustable "belt" was good enough for a side carry of my Glock 26. Plenty of pockets for flashlights and other things. Definitely isn't light weight, though.
customer_reviews.author: CTCraftBrew

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Super cool, cant beat price, quality is excellent, & so many pockets! Comes with strong velcro patch areas to add on, & 1 vest fits size small up to 5x. My son is a teenager who airsoft's & is super thin and 5'6" tall & its straps are pulked all the way snug for a mens small. When standing its a perfect fit. When he sits down the shoulder areas are about ear level to him but he doesnt care he will grow more into it & he sats ypu dont sit anyway when using the vest for that activity. Works well, loons great.
customer_reviews.author: AM

customer_reviews.title: Great once you get it to fit.
customer_reviews.text: Great for the price. It fits very well but getting to that point is a job best done with a friend to do the adjusting while you are wearing it. 5 stars otherwise. I don't understand all the too small size comments I am 5'11" and 220# and a larger person could fit just fine lots more room available.
customer_reviews.author: Alder Joe

customer_reviews.title: Big guys need to modify
customer_reviews.text: I'm usually comfortable in 3x shirts the vest did adjust to accommodate and the belt would adjust to my waist size however impossible to wear the vest with the belt I will have to lengthen the belt straps to the vest otherwise I would have to wear the belt around my stomach! The vest did come as advertised measurements were correct however manufacturer didn't take into account the length needed (shoulder to waist) wen it is being worn even with the adjustments maxed out.
customer_reviews.author: camoboy08

customer_reviews.title: Good high quality
customer_reviews.text: This is a great vest and has a lot of pockets for storage. The gun holster is held in place by Velcro ( hook and loop as they call it now days) so you have some versatile there as well,if you wish to put something else there. I strongly recommend this vest.
customer_reviews.author: Keith

customer_reviews.title: A bit on the heavier side
customer_reviews.text: The size is pretty good, it fits me pretty well. The price was around 30 dollars for another very similar product. This vest has a place for a handgun, but my handgun has flashlight or a laser and I am unable to fit the handgun in.
customer_reviews.author: Horse

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 for airsoft and it worked perfect with the pockets. Great deal for the money and if they get into hiking or Response team it will be great. We customized them by adding velcro monogram gamer tags and captain tags.
customer_reviews.author: Momma of 4

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t fit the type of mags I use, but there’s an upside
customer_reviews.text: Negatives. Doesn’t fit g36 mags, and the shoulder pad is only on the right side so I can’t lean left effectively. If worn comfortably, this doesn’t protect my neck, leaving it vulnerable Positives. This is surprisingly light. and the tightening straps don’t feel like they’ll break easily. I like the customization on it as well, like getting to pick and choose where my mag pouches are.
customer_reviews.author: Blair

customer_reviews.title: Best gift for my son.
customer_reviews.text: My 12 yr old son wants to be a bounty Hunter when he grows up, so I bought him this for his birthday. All his friends were envious and said they wanted one. I paired this with some tactical fingerless gloves and he look so cool. He is a bigger boy, so I got the adult size.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not a bad carrier vest but can be hard to fit if you are big frame
customer_reviews.text: The price is not that low so no star for that Quality is ok so one star for that Multiple accesories looks nice one star for that I don't recommend if you are a XXl and up since I am XL and had a hard time fitting on me so no star for that The shoulders if you are XL or bigger you can't adjust so no star for that
customer_reviews.author: Mario

customer_reviews.title: very good very tactical it does have trouble holding paintball pods ...
customer_reviews.text: very good very tactical it does have trouble holding paintball pods they tend to fall out when your playing
customer_reviews.author: Kirvi C

customer_reviews.title: Amazing item!
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly and I love it. Used it for a college costume party and everyone thought I was an actual police man, lol. Overall, an amazing item.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: ... on his moose hunting trip in Alaska - he loved the fit & the manageability to access his compartments
customer_reviews.text: Recently bought this for my husband to wear on his moose hunting trip in Alaska - he loved the fit & the manageability to access his compartments .
customer_reviews.author: Sandra C.

customer_reviews.title: A Great tactical vest at a great price
customer_reviews.text: This vest meets all of my needs for a tactical vest and the quality exceeded my expectations based on the low price !!! The seller delivered this vest flawlessly, just as described in the online Ad and it arrived sooner than expected !!!
customer_reviews.author: Bonita L. T.

customer_reviews.title: Fits like a glove.
customer_reviews.text: I really likes how the best fits my body and almost like a "1 size fits all" product. I had to tighten it up quite a bit and it fits great without looking like it's a large vest with a small guy trying to wear it. I would definitely buy this again looking forward to putting it to use!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Johnathon

customer_reviews.title: Great vest!
customer_reviews.text: Great vest, feels comfortable. Adjustable. I'm 6'3 184lbs and fits perfectly. The holster fits a full frame firearm. I'll be using this fit work a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Abdiel

customer_reviews.title: Watch the zipper
customer_reviews.text: Did not even go to the airsoft field and the zipper had already fallen apart at the top. Didn't really change anything just had to be careful, went out to the field got hit right dead center, more of the zipper fell off. Sowed it up together and it's fine now. Not as tough as another brands but if you put some time into making it durable it's decent. I only put in maybe an hour at most fixing it. A bit meh but I'm not complaining
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Big Guys This Is For Us
customer_reviews.text: Fits great. Just what I was looking for. I wear a 53 in a suit jacket and this gives me room to move. Have not put it to work yet but will comment on durability after.
customer_reviews.author: Lupe D

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: Item was way too small. Description says 4xl but the vest came with no label. My buddy's 2xl vest was bigger than this one
customer_reviews.author: timothy m

customer_reviews.title: Nice fit for 3x and 4x guys.
customer_reviews.text: Works well for us big guys. Size goes well into 4x. Was able to load with mags, shot shells, knife and other tactical gear.
customer_reviews.author: mgcarpenter

customer_reviews.title: Very durable and lightweight
customer_reviews.text: It was very durable and light weight I was surprised it does have several utility pockets and my 9 mm Ruger fits in the front pocket perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome quality like my Yakeda vest
customer_reviews.text: It's for my friend who wanted to join our airsoft troop. The vest is a heavy duty great quality vest like my Yakeda tactical vest. It has some weight to it. It's not a light flimsy mesh by any means. It is tough and the pouches in it are awesome. Mine had a mag in it though with some 17 caliber rounds. I don't know what that was doing here but it was an interesting find.
customer_reviews.author: AlexxDarke

customer_reviews.title: False advertising
customer_reviews.text: Advertised the size was a 4x and could easily be adjusted. My son is a 2x and it fits so tight that he can't zip it. EXTREMELY DISAPPOINTED. I will contact seller and see how they are gonna make this right. If they do make this right I will write another review.
customer_reviews.author: Robbin

customer_reviews.title: Ready to roll
customer_reviews.text: Awesome vest for my newfound airsoft hobby. Literally holds everything i need plus more
customer_reviews.author: LEO BROWNE

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: Says up to 4X, I am 5'10" 210 lbs and even with all straps open up, could not zip it up, NO WAY it fits up to 4X. Total waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Walt Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Finally
customer_reviews.text: I finally found a vest that fits a abnormally largeness. :o) I am 6'0, 285lbs and have tried a couple others that said they were adjustable to fit my size and none did, but this one did.
customer_reviews.author: andy

customer_reviews.title: Great Vest - We had a problem with the zipper ...
customer_reviews.text: Great Vest - We had a problem with the zipper breaking on the first vest that we ordered. We let the company know of the problem and they replaced it with a newly designed more robust zipper. My son loves it for airsoft and we have had no more problems.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beware of size
customer_reviews.text: Short compared to picture. Goes out to more like 2xl instead of 4xl. I just hung in closet because it's just another thing bought that isn't correct.
customer_reviews.author: Marcello Kendrick

customer_reviews.title: Chinese size
customer_reviews.text: One-size-fits-all if you're a little Chinese guy. in America this should fit a large teenager or maybe a medium-sized teenager
customer_reviews.author: Lisa dergan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for bigger people nice quality!
customer_reviews.text: Im a tubs and i wear a 2-3x shirt that fits loose and comfortably.. and this jacket fits very well. Fully adjustable will even go bigger than me. I had a hard time finding one for us bigger bellied people but this really is perfect. Soooo many pockets! Nice zipper, has spots for a big back velcro patch and for a smaller one on the right chest. If your a bit bigger really get this one! You wont regret it.
customer_reviews.author: veronica

customer_reviews.title: Great buy and recommended to several bigger airsofters
customer_reviews.text: I have tried several tach vest and none have fit. Being a bigger guy wearing xxl I would order the largest size they would have and still to small and felt like a sports bra. This whole vest can be fully adjusted to fit the barrel chested or the barrel belly and everything between. I have moded my vest to fit my UMP mags which worked out great. The tach best is a must but for us tanks on the Airsoft field.
customer_reviews.author: Big Rig

customer_reviews.title: good bargain
customer_reviews.text: not bad but could be a little more versatile, all things combined it’s a a pretty good package.
customer_reviews.author: Roadside Rick

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: Excellent fit, I'm 6'2 270, a little gut, nice material, the vest probably won't fit any one bigger, it's at max expanding to fit me.
customer_reviews.author: MG_RA

customer_reviews.title: It's definitely an excellent product. My chunky butt could probably use to ...
customer_reviews.text: It's definitely an excellent product. My chunky butt could probably use to lose a few pounds to make it fit better, but even as someone who's 6'3" and 350lbs I can still get it to fit.
customer_reviews.author: Huey

customer_reviews.title: price and delivery
customer_reviews.text: Have not used it must but looks well made and delivery was fast and price was right
customer_reviews.author: cjtaylor

customer_reviews.title: Waterpouch on your back and molle setup Couldn't be happier
customer_reviews.text: Came a day early!! Fits well! Pistol holster is strong and the mag pouches are convenient! Waterpouch on your back and molle setup Couldn't be happier
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Seems a bit short shoulder to waist for me but I’m long wasted, the belt sits just below my belly button. Otherwise good stuff.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer costa

customer_reviews.title: great vest, well made
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect and makes a great addition to young mans costume ! everyone happy!
customer_reviews.author: Makaio

customer_reviews.title: Heavy. Really, really heavy. I'm 6"2 - ...
customer_reviews.text: Heavy. Really, really heavy. I'm 6"2 - 205, and I find it fits very well, but, as stated above, its heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa L.

customer_reviews.title: Good for the sizes
customer_reviews.text: First I bought it for myself that I'm bigger than the size but I gave it to my son adjusted it now if it's him great especially for his first tactical vest really impressed with it
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Lee Collins

customer_reviews.title: The fit is excellent
customer_reviews.text: THIS VEST IS THE BEST! Top quality many different size pockets for extra storage. Adjustable for a perfect fit especially over extra clothing. And its good looking and very professional.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gun holster measurements
customer_reviews.text: Received my vest as a Father's day gift and I was impressed. Only problem was that my 9 mm shield didn't fit the holster which I expected but over all easy to adjust with pouches for extra ammo will suggest buying.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon A.

customer_reviews.title: Great but not prefect
customer_reviews.text: The vest is light and durable but the material on the inside is not soft like I expected it's hard and feels rough on my skin or even through some of my shirts but I love all the storage on it and I wear it every time I play airsoft and get compliments on it everytime well worth $30 but not $50 or above.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Prefect fit
customer_reviews.text: I have two heavy sons 21 & 23 with weight in the 400lbs and their height is 5/10 & 6/2 these fit well and they are ready for airsoft. Best thing is with the exercise they will gain from this activity, they will be able to still wear these vests as they get more fit.
customer_reviews.author: Kissyzombie

customer_reviews.title: The best choice!
customer_reviews.text: If you aren’t use to wearing one of these it’s a bit to get use to bit its very comfortable and very good quality! I think this is the best choice if you need one. There’s so many pockets and even a spot on the back to add some Velcro patch at the top.
customer_reviews.author: Shawna

customer_reviews.title: Great vest!
customer_reviews.text: Loved the color and size. It went great with my fiancé’s Halloween costume! We are excited for the day!
customer_reviews.author: Neikya

customer_reviews.title: Well made and tough!
customer_reviews.text: Despite the cheap price, this vest is very well made! I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Bent T.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice for the price
customer_reviews.text: Fit decently well the adjustments are alittle confusing at first but feels great once you have it the way you want it. My only major complaint is the shotgun shell holders weren't sewed on very good it basically fell apart but was easily fixed, other than that it's amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my application
customer_reviews.text: Used for a halloween costume. Very nice quality. Will never see action. Delivered quick.
customer_reviews.author: player

customer_reviews.title: Handy
customer_reviews.text: Great for airsofting. Holds all the magazines I need it to. It essentially decreases the pain of the BB’s, and that’s just without a plate. The option to put plates in are available. Great vest!
customer_reviews.author: Clay .T.

customer_reviews.title: Get what you pay for I guess
customer_reviews.text: Not left hand friendly also the back Mesh was torn upon open the package. It is what it is.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny Cage

customer_reviews.title: Good quality!
customer_reviews.text: Really good quality and meet expectations. Bought it as a gift for my son and he love it! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: LisaAlisa

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and plates can go in the places needed if wanting to
customer_reviews.author: jeff

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this!!! Great quality!! Better then I thought it would be when I ordered it!
customer_reviews.author: Becks

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: My youngest is using this for airsoft. Hes a big boy 200lbs and has plenty room to grow. Pistol fits nicely very good setup good material
customer_reviews.author: Derrick

customer_reviews.title: Dropped a star for steep price
customer_reviews.text: Great quality but a bit pricey. I use it for nerf events. It holds my smaller pistol which is great should I ever need that but I can't imagine a need for it.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew S.

customer_reviews.title: Best Vest for the job
customer_reviews.text: Looks just like the photo, easy to adjust to the size you need. Enough pouches for all my equipment and then some. Very happy customer.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Walker

customer_reviews.title: Great vest
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good vest , very well-made, for the price that has everything I needed and is a comfortable fit for me. Would definitely recommend based on this.
customer_reviews.author: PumpkinSpice

customer_reviews.title: Pretty cool
customer_reviews.text: I’m a big guy so I needed to take the belt off, but it fits fine after that.
customer_reviews.author: Spookyfish

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is super nice and light weight and easy to adjust.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler E.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this vest. I use it for airsoft and it works great and fits great
customer_reviews.author: Raquel

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fits great, love all the compartments for my gear and magazines. Highly recommend this item!!
customer_reviews.author: David Rohlman

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Full of pockets. The pockets have pockets. My cz fits perfectly inbthe holster. The only problem is the back strap which is not that stong.
customer_reviews.author: Alejandro H.

customer_reviews.title: ... a gift for my grandson and he is very happy with it
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift for my grandson and he is very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Mary D.

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money, has plenty of pockets, hostler, nice piece.
customer_reviews.text: Well worth the money, has plenty of pockets, hostler, nice piece.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth David Rich, Sui Juris

customer_reviews.title: Good product and with adjustments available in the vest 4x is 4x.
customer_reviews.text: I'm a very large man . The 4x when let out does fit. I'm well over 300lbs at this point
customer_reviews.author: Vaughn Hutchison

customer_reviews.title: Perfect tactical vest for airsoft
customer_reviews.text: Great quality vest for the price! Son loves it, used for airsoft wars. Alot thicker and better quality than expected. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Blystone

customer_reviews.title: Good solid vest!
customer_reviews.text: These vests are awesome! Got one for me, and one for my brother! So many pockets! The zipper is a little cheap and easy to break! Other than that! Perfect!!
customer_reviews.author: Brody Nicholson

customer_reviews.title: Great but bad holster and no room for paint canisters
customer_reviews.text: It is great however the pictures online are deceiving, there is no room for paintball canisters and the holster for a sidearm hangs out a little. My gun is fairly heavy so it could just be my sidearm but I’m ordering a hip holster rather than using this
customer_reviews.author: Branton

customer_reviews.title: Quality is excellent..Design is awful
customer_reviews.text: This is very well made, but the design is over complicated..Very difficult to adjust..Spent 2 hours and still don;t have it set up correctly...I would not buy it again
customer_reviews.author: F. King

customer_reviews.title: Fiercest looking kid on the block
customer_reviews.text: Kid who wanted it for Christmas loves it. A little big for him, but we expected that.
customer_reviews.author: KJS

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be good quality for the $$
customer_reviews.text: 5'8" 200 lb barrel chest. Fits very well and has plenty of adjustment to go bigger or smaller. Seems of good quality, but only time will tell. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny P.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Really nice, better than expected. I’m 6’ and about 250 and I fit into it lol. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: OoHaKMaNoO

customer_reviews.title: Not too shabby
customer_reviews.text: Not bad, not great either. Zipper is on the wrong side, as expected for a China product. Netting is rather flimsy but overall I like it.
customer_reviews.author: K. W.

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price ment for right handed shooters
customer_reviews.text: Fairly good quality wish it was more customizable the pistol holster is useless for me since its set up for right hand draw was really adjustable on size witch is good
customer_reviews.author: Seth Murchison

customer_reviews.title: I recommend this product..
customer_reviews.text: I like that it has a holster for my side arm. I love the pouches for all my AR Magazines. Very durable and well put together.
customer_reviews.author: Damien Morris

customer_reviews.title: Reasonable price for a great product!
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied. My son loved the fit, and all the pockets and compartments. It's very well made.
customer_reviews.author: CINDY STEVENS

customer_reviews.title: Tac vest
customer_reviews.text: This is great product can carry everything you need on the hunt recommend this to all great value and well made adjustable for larger people love it
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: The vest was fine and had all of the attachments as advertised but ...
customer_reviews.text: The vest was fine and had all of the attachments as advertised but is too small for us fat guys. If your shirt size is larger than a large this vest is too small for you.
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: Super fast delivery
customer_reviews.text: A great vest reasonably priced and expandable enough to fit the heftiest of us big boys. Good quality material that does not feel cheap or cheaply made. Very well satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Gene

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my husband as a gift. He was so excited playing around with all the features. He really liked it a lot.
customer_reviews.author: MYB

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This product is very good quality and was as described. Fits perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Phillip Neely

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This vest was everything they said it was very happy with it
customer_reviews.author: michael housinger

customer_reviews.title: Totally worth it!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love these vests. Got one for my husband and I. They're highly adjustable and confortable. Not heavy, lots of storage, and great for the cost. Shipping was fast. In general, I love it and would highly recommended it!
customer_reviews.author: Amber D.

customer_reviews.title: Tactical
customer_reviews.text: Kids loved this made them feel like they are the real deal...
customer_reviews.author: diama

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a couple of these. Storage space is great and fits awesome. Used for airsoft.
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: Five stars all around.
customer_reviews.text: Everything is what I expected well worth the money.The adjustments for the size is awesome I’m really stoked.
customer_reviews.author: David young

customer_reviews.title: Durability
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed to handle my ammo for III%ers
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: fits large people
customer_reviews.text: fits like a glove... I like it so well I bought another one for my son who is also large 6-2 285lb he loves it also great buy for a large guy....
customer_reviews.author: Ron Johnson

customer_reviews.title: It’s pretty nice but it’s missing parts they forgot to include the shotgun shell holder
customer_reviews.text: It’s pretty nice but it’s missing parts they forgot to include the shotgun shell holder
customer_reviews.author: phillip

product_meta.title: GZ XINXING S - 4XL Law Enforcement Tactical Airsoft Paintball Vest
feature_bullets: 30-Days NO RISK 100% Full Refund Assurance for any reason .The best and only Tactical vest you'll ever need. If you are not satisfied for any reason, such as size,or any other reason. money back guarantee!

Most of the maximum chest of other vests is about 54". We increase the length of the straps on sides and the belt to make the vest suit for most people with larger body size. - Item size: 22.83*15.74*4.33inch(58*40*11cm). Adjustable sizing, S-4XL for adults.The smallest chest size is 35 inch, the maximum chest size is 61 inch.PROBABLY fit person 100lb - 300lb, below 6'6"

Tactical vest is mounted on tough nylon mesh material which air ventilation.Vest zips up in front and can be secured additionally with a pistol belt (included) threaded through the loops on the bottom. - Interior of vest has two zip-up document pockets left and right.

Left side features a pistol holster for most medium-framed pistols, 3 pistol mag pouches that are adjustable to the height of most normal-sized mag.Right side features 3 ammo pouches, large shell carrying pouch, and a shooting pad.

Shoulders on vest can be adjusted with long velcro strips, and also have 2 mental D-rings for the attachment of carabiners or other equipments.Rear of vest is double-ply mesh which allows for the addition of a hydration bladder(not include). - A carrying handle is provided as well as strips across the back for the addition of camouflage material or other pouches.Left and right sides can be adjusted for width via webbings.

specifications.Manufacturer: China Xinxing Guangzhou Import And Export Corporation
